name: A Cave Tale
description:
This game was made for the 2020 VimJam on Collectibles.

The game follows the story of Ramon, a kid reading about a dark cave that houses an ancient sword. Ramon imagines himself only armed with a flashlight as he traverses the cave to retrieve the sword.

Collect batteries to improve your flashlight strength. Collect the sword and return to the entrance to win the game.

Controls:
A-D to move left and right
Space to Jump
Mouse up/down to control flashlight

Notes: Full-screening may slightly reduce your framerate. The level is pretty challenging, especially for certain jumps
